617115603.name: Elegant, fine food on a beer budget
617115603.author: a TripAdvisor user
617115603.reviewBody: From linen tablecloths to a super charming and professional wait staff this place was a big surprise in little sleepy Tepic. By American Standards this place is cheap...less that $20 for two entrees and 2 beers. I really liked the half indoor-half outdoor table we had. We had hamburgers and french fries after eating Mexican food for months. And it was one of the best burgers I\'ve ever had outside of California. A short walk from the city center, this place was a good choice for us.

503916867.name: It\'s Amazing
503916867.author: a TripAdvisor user
503916867.reviewBody: I love it because I could take a hike in the moorning and have a beautiful view of the city and also because you could breath clean air

463912240.name: Good for exercise, great views and different levels.
463912240.author: a TripAdvisor user
463912240.reviewBody: If you are visiting Tepic, Cerro de San Juan offers a great option if you like to do exercise surrounded by nature. Make sure to use proper clothes. Early in the morning temperatures could be low. If you are getting to the top early you will enjoy great views of the city. There are different stops and as you rise to the top you can find different kind of nature. Please don\u00b4t go by yourself and try to visit it with company. Bring your water and lunch if you are planning to stay for a long time over there. Please take back your rubbish.

664362176.name: Good but not great historic centro
664362176.author: a TripAdvisor user
664362176.reviewBody: We read the reviews about Tepic\'s historic centro district which sounded really good but the reality we found was less than we expected. Although there were some really good historic buildings, like the cathedral; there was less to see then we expected. We have seen many historic centro in other cities and that is why we would say Tepic\'s centro historic is worth visiting but it is not the best

533877541.name: Brief look Around
533877541.author: a TripAdvisor user
533877541.reviewBody: We drove to Tepic from Puerto Vallarta, only about 165km but took almost 4 hours, with a couple of photo stops.  Very nice drive but long and slow.  Only spent a couple of hours in Centro Historico de Tepic but found it a very interesting place, took some nice photos and had lunch in a very hot and uncomfortable cafe called Tower or something.\n\nWould definitely visit Centro Historico de Tepic again and spend more time looking around.

522996495.name: Not Magic But Real
522996495.author: a TripAdvisor user
522996495.reviewBody: The best thing about Tepic is that it does not really cater to tourists, so you can just wander around and experience organic Mexican life - as many people come from the county side to buy their stuff.

521467420.name: A must visit while in Tepic!
521467420.author: a TripAdvisor user
521467420.reviewBody: Take a day to wander downtown. The shopping, the food, and if around the holidays great local artisans selling their work. The people were great and we enjoyed our day downtown. The city is growing fast and everyone seemed to be out shopping after work. Better to take a cab downtown as parking is sparse.

595087722.name: Parque Ecol\u00f3gico de Tepic Nayarit
595087722.author: a TripAdvisor user
595087722.reviewBody: We had the opportunity to visit the Ecological Park of Tepic Nayarit. This park has lots of activities that you can do with your family. The atmosphere and people here are very friendly!

570249997.name: Pleasant City Park with Lovely Water Feature
570249997.author: a TripAdvisor user
570249997.reviewBody: We stopped for the evening at the Best Western Ne Kie hotel and looked online for a park to stroll in.   The Ecological park was two blocks away.   We grabbed our cameras and walked over and were very pleased with the water features, especially a long slew/moat encircling an large island of reeds and other plants.   The water was populated by turtles, many types of birds and many fish.   In a swampy area upstream of a weir we saw hundreds of small creatures either minnows or tadpoles.   We were treated to a sighting of one new bird, a least bittern.   There were many people enjoying the park with their kids.  No cost to enter.   Bathrooms at both ends of the long park.

536218287.name: Pppular with locals
536218287.author: a TripAdvisor user
536218287.reviewBody: On a long walk, we stopped  for lunch at Rhino Wings, a sports bar. Locals were watching soccer on TV. No Ameerican here on our visit. Crowded place had a menu  that include a cocktail listed as a \u201cMother F-ker). Brazen. We would not go out of our way toreturn, but it was good for Mazatlan soccer fans. Tired from our walk,we took a pulmonia back to Pueblo Bonito.

526309196.name: Park with so many things you can do
526309196.author: a TripAdvisor user
526309196.reviewBody: Yesterday happened on the park on the way to a restaurant. Surprised to discover olympic-size pool, gymnasium, tennis courts, skate park, children\'s areas, and best of all, outdoor therapeutic work-out equipment. I mean a lot of stations in a very large area. In addition, the park ground is immaculately clean, trimmed, and inviting. Little children will enjoy the train that takes them around the park. Only wish it we\'re closer to where we live.

503918706.name: Nice
503918706.author: a TripAdvisor user
503918706.reviewBody: You could take a walk in the park or run or just go with your family in the afternoon to buy chimichangas o some other things that people sell there

456566339.name: Fun!
456566339.author: a TripAdvisor user
456566339.reviewBody: La Loma is such a fun great park to visit. Whether you want to work out, go for a walk, enjoy some games, eat some snacks, they\'ve got it all! They even have a little train that goes around the park. I\'m not sure on what days they have this, but they have an amphitheater where they have shows or free movies, with plenty of seats! It\'s definitely a great park to come and just hang with friends or family.

449424893.name: I love it
449424893.author: a TripAdvisor user
449424893.reviewBody: Very safe there\'s people doing their service, i think from school and they take care of us making sure everything is going well, love the slides, the swings, everything is affordable, the kids had so much fun, they ride some horses, the jungla magica had some broken slides and some unsafe rides they seem to be broken, but lots of trees lots of things to do we love it

449016382.name: Great park to have time with the family
449016382.author: a TripAdvisor user
449016382.reviewBody: To mention the spectacle of music with the water mountain, ponny and horses for kids and the open air cinema

431679047.name: Morning walk in La Loma Park
431679047.author: a TripAdvisor user
431679047.reviewBody: Great place for taking our morning walk.  Enjoyed fresh coconuts in the park.   It was only one block away from out hotel.

416545161.name: A fun option for your stay
416545161.author: a TripAdvisor user
416545161.reviewBody: A nice way to spend a few hours enjoying a little greenery in the heart of the city.  The Train ride that runs thru the park is a fun and easy way to explore and see the sights.

411946926.name: Lots of trees, green areas and fun at the playground
411946926.author: a TripAdvisor user
411946926.reviewBody: This is the biggest and most important park in the city so it becomes a \u201cMUST\u201d on things to do in Tepic. It has many areas from children area, courts, skate park, dog\u00b4s area, a little train and most important, lots of trees and green areas. Sometimes there are students doing a social service and they help people or give information to visitors. It\u00b4s a great place to do some exercise or to take the children to enjoy the place. There have always been issues with toilets as they are never clean enough and sometimes are closed. There are hospitals and different kind of restaurants around the park, there are also some snack options at the food court of the park. Last time I was there I enjoyed a very nice Nayarit coffee at the cafeteria. It\u00b4s a park where you will enjoy the time and very important you will have to interact with your company. The children area is full of memories of many children from Tepic. I recommend a visit of maybe 1 hour if you are looking for something special, if you or your children find fun at the green area or the playground just enjoy much as possible with those simple things.

384148267.name: Basically a children\'s park
384148267.author: a TripAdvisor user
384148267.reviewBody: It is a nice place to take yours smaller kids. Aside from a mini train ride that takes you around the park, there is nothing particularly noteworthy.

656162660.name: Ni pa\' tanto
656162660.author: a TripAdvisor user
656162660.reviewBody: Demasiada propaganda para un lugar tan peque\u00f1o, est\u00e1 bien pero es un peligro las \u00e1reas que se comunican entre s\u00ed de salto, el \u00e1rea de trampolines es demasiado reducida para divertirse o ejercitarse adecuadamente, todas las edades est\u00e1n revueltas y no me parece seguro para los menores.

626558601.name: Trampolines
626558601.author: a TripAdvisor user
626558601.reviewBody: Buena opci\u00f3n para ir con ni\u00f1os peque\u00f1os de 3 o 4 a\u00f1os en adelante, tienen muro para escalar, un \u00e1rea grande de trampolines y un juego mec\u00e1nico con un tipo mazo que gira y debes saltar o agacharte para que no te tumbe. Sin embargo no tienen personal que est\u00e9 supervisando a los ni\u00f1os.\nCuentan con \u00e1rea de mesas y sillas para platicar o comer algo de su cafeter\u00eda mientras los ni\u00f1os juegan, pero son pocas.

611702021.name: recreacion
611702021.author: a TripAdvisor user
611702021.reviewBody: ideal para  pasar la tarde en familia muy funcional servicio de comida rapida en general  muy buen lugar

591937366.name: Lugar divertido
591937366.author: a TripAdvisor user
591937366.reviewBody: Lugar ideal para gastar algo de energ\u00eda de manera divertida, se puede llevar a los ni\u00f1os a saltar y pasar un rato agradable, lo recomiendo ampliamente.
